name: Lilith's Maze Run
description:
The entity that is Lilith has trapped Tafadzwa (Taffy) an eighteen year old boy in her perverse maze prison and he must find a way to escape it before she drains him of his life  force by basically screwing him...

Play as Tafadzwa (Taffy) as you discover and complete different parts of the maze and the many....many monster girls there to keep you company and side track your quest in the best possible way!

Fetishes:

-Milf

-Monster Girls

-Foot

-Furry

-Harem

(Some of  these are coming in future builds)

Support The Game:

Any support towards the game is welcomed immensely for it aids in the creation of better versions whilst also allowing the people that work on the game to dedicate more time into it's creation and overall production. If want to support the game you could become a patron of the CxrdMxster: www.patreon.com/cxrdmxster
